title: Chōrakuji Station
text: Chorakuji Station is a <a href="Hiroshima%20Rapid%20Transit">HRT</a> <a href="Metro%20station">station</a> on <a href="Astram%20Line">Astram Line</a>, located in 1-28-37, Chorakuji, <a href="Asaminami-ku%2C%20Hiroshima">Asaminami-ku</a>, <a href="Hiroshima">Hiroshima</a>.
